text: Gumazamizir Babilon ategha uan nguibamɨn izeziba, me bar uari bagh averpenibar ingara egha dar iti. Bar fomɨra Nunɨn otarim Josuan dughiamɨn, Israelia kamagh garir averpenibar ingarigha, dar aven ikia isar kam gami. Ezɨ Josua aremezɨma, me gɨn arazir kam uam a gamir puvatɨ. Israelia datɨrɨghɨn uam arazir kam gamua men naviba bar akonge.
